website_summaries.verdict: Gets high marks across the board as a sturdy, high-quality cooler.
pros: Latchless lid allows you to access contents with one hand
Smaller size is perfect for fitting into tight spaces
cons: You'll need to pre-cool this option for several hours before use
Does not come with an AC adapter

customer_reviews.title: Good concept and product but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Thermo-electric coolers are in general much lighter and much cheaper than the big-fridge-like ones with compressor. This TE cooler one is of right size and a narrow width that fits perfectly between front & back seats of even a compact car. The operation is simplicity itself. I only used it as a cooler, and found that travelling on a hot day, advertised 40 deg maintenance was not really possible. So great for cooling drinks, etc., but not so much for keeping refrigerating food, e.g., milk. In the latter case, suggest supplementing with ice or cold slabs. You will also want the A/C adapter that is sold separately, so you can leave contents in and run this when at a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: LazyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long...back to ice cubes I go
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2014 and used it 12 times. For the 12 times that I used it, worked great. Just returned from a 2 week vacation and the darned thing conked out. I use it for my low carb foods and diabetic supplies. Car battery couldn’t keep it cool and when plugged in to the electrical outlets at the hotels, wouldn’t work either. $110 is a good price to pay and expected it to have a longer life span. Kept it clean and stored in a great place. Pity.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CookerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Three years w/no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e used this every day in a work truck so its plugged in about 12 hours a day 5 days a week. Three years with no problems at all. Keeps dairy products and chicken with mayo sandwiches at a safe temp all day. The only thing keeping it from being 5 stars is not getting an A/C plug with it (available for an extra $50). Sometimes on overnight jobs I want to bring it in a hotel room but don't have an A/C plug.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift ahead of time and when it was just opened and went to use there is no seal on the lid. I am out side of the return date and the cooler will not work correct without seal.
customer_reviews.author: lori g

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say it stopped working on the first day in the car. I bought the AC adapter and it worked fine at home. Then in the car, it didn't work. I brought it into the hotel, expecting the AC adapter to work but it didn't. Too bad. Great size. I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for long trips
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cooler to keep medications and snacks/drinks cool on an extended vacation. It fit perfectly between the second-row seats in our van and performed perfectly. Plugged into a switched cigarette-lighter type socket, we didn't have to worry about running the battery down while sight-seeing. The insulation was sufficient to keep everything cool for a few hours while off. We pulled it into our motel room each evening and used a 110AC adapter to keep it running - only a steady, low fan hum which was drowned out by most motel's AC/heat systems. It was great to be able to stop someplace scenic and have a cold drink whenever we wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: GHannah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for weekend trips. It fits nicely right behind the seat and the slim design is perfect for that since it's on the floor. I recommend buying the adapter so you can plug it in to cool it down at least a couple hours before you put it in your vehicle (or wherever you use it). We I haven't tried the "warming" feature beyond turning it on in my house to see that it works so I can't say much about that. I can just tell you this is the ideal cooler for tossing in the car withouht it taking a wide amount of space up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MIC

customer_reviews.title: This one didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I love these coolers, as a truck driver who works with a partner these are nice and compact, still a big cooler but the slim design is great for the tight design of truck cab. The only reason this gets a 1 star is merely for the fact that the one I received didn't work at all. Sent in for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to have cold food on my truck. I am a semi truck driver. This cooler works very good! It will keep all of your food and drinks cold! If you put a warm drink in it takes about 2 hours to get cold. I havent tried the warming option yet. Just be careful and dont plug up the space around the vent area it wont work well if it happens. Overall this cooler exceeded my expectations and im thinking about buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  automobile accessory
customer_reviews.text: An excellent accessory to have in your car while traveling any distance at all. Keeps items like soft drinks nice and cool. BUT its best capability is MAINTAINING low temperatures - so don't put warm drinks inside, and expect them to get cold quickly - make sure those drinks are cool BEFOREHAND - then the unit will maintain that cold.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Solid cooler
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I did a lot of research before buying this model after my old Coleman cooler died. My Coleman model lasted 10+ years and I am expecting the same from this Koolatron. After reading some of the reviews on this I want to clarify one thing. The thermoelectric cooler does have a fan on the inside of the cooler this help distribute the cold air. There is a lot of room I can fit two full gallons of milk and other things on top of the milk and it all stays nice and cold. I have owned this for over two years now and it is still going strong. Very well made and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the car on trips. no ice needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace a larger unit for road trips. The fan is quiet. It cools to 30 degrees or so below ambient temp. It holds a 2 liter bottle or a few bottles of water and light road snacks. It fits snugly behind the drivers seat on the floor board and is easily accessible from front passenger seat. It probably would not work for a family with several kids but then you would get a larger unit. It hold more than you would think because there is no ice taking up room and getting stuff wet.
customer_reviews.author: hlbo47

customer_reviews.title: Came without a DC cord. Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently another customer didn't get one either. Looking at customer Q&A it should have and over time the length has varied from 4 ft to 10 ft. Cord isn't mentioned in the product description one way or the other. Returning item. Should have cord for $100.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Koolatron not cool
customer_reviews.text: The Kookatron does not work. Turns on but no cooling. I've tried calling Koolatron service support several times but am on hold endlessly until the system drops the call. I also sent an email to them with no response. Bad product and worse customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Melafefon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Heat works, cool not even a little. Interior temp after 3 hours = room temp (73.7). Bought their AC power adapter to try on house current - no change. I waited too long to try it (I’m an idiot, I thought it would work). Now our trip is postponed while I buy a different brand locally. I’m outside the short rerun window so I’m stuck with this expensive waste basket with a handle. Customer service is voicemail.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V Nevans

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler.  Can freeze water.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized refrigerated cooler. I bought an AC adapter also so that I could cool down the contents the night before. I put a glass of water in it. Eight hours later the water was half frozen! What a great cooler. The size it perfect to allow us to place it on the floor behind the driver front seat.
customer_reviews.author: MG in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased unless it took it's turn driving
customer_reviews.text: This thing is flat-out great. We took it on vacation with us. It fits on the floor behind the front seats. It opens from the side, so the passenger can always access it without the driver having to mover the seat. We kept items in it for several days and they kept very well. And nothing was drowning in melted ice! We got the adapter for regular electricity, so it could come in with us at night. We were surprised at how roomy it is and the volume of food it holds. The one thing to be aware of is that anything up against the fan/cooling unit can freeze. This was a plus for us. Also, it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: sewcrow

customer_reviews.title: It’s really great for keeping drinks and sandwiches cold when we’re hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned one for over a year, and I’ve used it about a dozen times. It’s really great for keeping drinks and sandwiches cold when we’re hiking or off-roading close to home, and don’t want to mess with the cooler and ice. I add a couple of frozen water bottles to help it cool down and stay cool when the power is off. It’s lightweight and a convenient size to quickly load and unload. A couple of times I’ve used it for long drives over several days, just to have access to cold drinks without having to pull over to get to the cooler. It worked great for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Needs good air circulation.
customer_reviews.text: THIS NEEDS GOOD CIRCULATION TO WORK PROPERLY! As long as it has that it is a decent cooler. My husband uses it in his 18 wheeler and was experiencing many of the issues mentioned. We created a very simple platform for it to sit on so it could have air circulating underneath. We took two 1x2s that came out if our dishwasher packaging, laid them on their sides as far apart as the cooler is wide and stapled a piece of leftover foam board insulationto them. We placed the cooler on that and it works much better. It is still more effective if your stuff, especially drinks, is already cool, but it does a reasonable job of cooling things down.
customer_reviews.author: COW02

customer_reviews.title: Opens Up a New World of Travel
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have said- this is an excellent item. Bought it with one specific purpose in mind: to keep ice bags cold for my back on driving trips. Happy to report it did just that. Our four hour drive / overnighter was just perfect. We took it into the hotel, plugged it in for the next day trip home. Even stored it unplugged in the bellman hold for four hours and was still acceptably cold for the trip home. This item will be a great part of our newfound ability to make longer trips without as much pain. Thanks Koolatron!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works great in my Van
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great in my Van. The adapter gets super hot when I use it to plug into my Aux Power when I'm not running my Cargo Van. Wagan 5 amp AC to 12V DC Power Adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: right fit
customer_reviews.text: I Have a 2015 Ford Transit van I converted to an RV and needed a cooler to fit between the two front bucket seat and this fit great and is high enough to be within easy reach. Keeps pop and sandwiches cold and hold a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We received this item so quickly, we weren't sure what it was. When we opened the package and saw what it was, we were very pleased! We used this for a trip from Texas to California and back over the Thanksgiving holiday. It really came in handy to keep water and other drinks cold. We even put some fruit cups in there for the kids! Having cold drinks on hand without having to worry about slinging ice or cold water inside the vehicle was really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. It is as loud as an old desktop computer....maybe the fan is recycled form those old power supplies -I’m KIDDING . It is all new construction. I used this on a recent camping trip to transport cool beverages in the car and store perishables at camp.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for car camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for summer time car camping I'm doing in Northwest TX. This cooler is way better on keeping g my food (bacon, cheese, steak, shrimp etc) nice and cool. I don't add any ice to cooler, just keep in the car, plug in to ac outlet. Nothing got spoiled so far.
customer_reviews.author: glockgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler nothing competes w cooling ability if you put ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth unit my units rin 24/7 around 275 days a year at that usage rate they last 2-3 years!! Awesome cooler nothing competes w cooling ability if you put cold in it will be colder out. I use it for soda and slow thaw frozen items in my truck. Oh im a long haul truckerso it has to work or it doesnt stay
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fred

customer_reviews.title: Best plug in cooler!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the identical cooler which died after FIFTEEN years! He was devastated! I was so happy to find the exact same cooler. It fits nicely between the front seat and back seat space. My kids use it as a footrest! It cools AND warms. We use it all the time! We used the old one constantly. Such a great price to last 15+ years!
customer_reviews.author: Pam St. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't keep cold. The fan was not safely covered, anyone's hand easily would stop the fan if pushing just right. And since the fan is on the top in the center it's easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: agoodnight

customer_reviews.title: Great for roadtrips!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is awesome. I took it with me on a road trip through Yellowstone, Teton, and Glacier national parks. It kept things cool while I drove despite the summer heat, and didn't seem to draw too much power since my Prius still got awesome gas mileage even with it plugged in. In the evenings I would bring it into my room for the night and use an adapter to plug it into an outlet. this allowed me to keep some healthier food on me and keep cold bottles of water for between hikes. The smaller profile also fit perfectly in front of my passenger seat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for work/travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this electric cooler a few months ago when I started a traveling job. I am a breastfeeding/pumping mom and needed to have something that would keep my pumped breastmilk cold in the car during my 10-hour work shift in the hot FL weather that also had room for my lunch. I didn't want a regular cooler because I also need to cool my milk down to a safe temperature after pumping. I'm happy to say that this cooler works wonderfully! My milk is ice cold after 11+ hours even with turning it on and off when I stop the car. I haven't had any problems with the cord or fan. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buntington

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, worthy the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooler that I've ever had. I put a couple of blue ice packs in the bottom and it keeps things cold for a couple of days. I drive a 18 wheeler and out on the road for a couple of days at a time. It actually freezes a water bottle if I put it on top of it. The only thing I would really like is a way to have cup holders on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our road tripping. Big enough to keep lots of stuff cold. Form factored to fit perfectly between the front and rear seats. No need to go out and buy ice, No melted ice soaking everything. With the a/c adaptor, we just carry the cooler to our hotel room and plug it in. Now, we just carry our food with us and don't need to waste time and money at fast food joints or roadside restaurants. Also, no moving parts other than a small cooling fan, so I expect long service live. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Hard worker!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of these types of coolers from other "big name" companies. Fans seem to be as cheap as they can find and fail frequently with continuous use. The Koolatron has kept up the pace with no problems. Used it on a two month RV trip early this year and ran continuously for many days during the trip. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Used for breast milk storage and travel.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cooler because my wife was gong on a girls weekend and needing to store breast milk. There was not enough room in the fridge and with travel in the car. We have only used it during that time but worked great. We only stored breast milk in it but kept it cold and there was a few crystals in it too. The handle does seem a little flimsy and I worry about breaking it.I would classify it as a medium-small size cooler. For a few things it works great.
customer_reviews.author: James P Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, but thermal insulation seems weak
customer_reviews.text: The cooling element works alright, but it doesn't seem like the actual insulation of the cooler is very good. It seems like the inside warms up quite quick without having the cooling element on.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Roadee Essential
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this is #1 for a bonafide road trip. It's not a refrigerator. But you can safely keep leftovers throughout the days and your beverages and fruit salads and other items cold. Ours is in the trunk of our minivan and plugs into the back outlet. You can purchase an adaptor to plug it into a wall outlet overnight if you're in a hotel room without a fridge. Long-lasting. We've used it numerous times and it's still ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Joy from Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: The death of a good friend.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooler for over 6 years working right next to me 5 days a week 24 hours A-day. She always kept my drinks cold and will be sadly missed I can't wait for the new arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Condon

customer_reviews.title: 1st one lasted a long long time
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes through abuse, dirty mechanic truck, dust bouncing around and lasted a really long time, finally replacing with a new one, love it, Great Cooler!!
customer_reviews.author: SRO

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: First time on a road trip with it. For what ever reason it started out cold then after an hour or so in to our road trip it turned in to a heater. Everything inside is hot! We lost all our food and snacks. Save up and buy a better cooler. This sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Don Wagner

customer_reviews.title: love it, perfect for our use
customer_reviews.text: this cooler fits perfectly between the seats of out little Toyota pickup, we strap it in with the seat belt and off we go. as a previous reviewer noted, cooling it the night before and adding cold food is the way to keep things cool. I added frozen food and it was still frozen two days later. at night we use the wall plug converter. it's relatively quiet in the car, but in the room a bit noisy, so we place it in the bathroom. Motel rooms are noisy anyway, so no big deal. we definitely love it and highly recommend it to anyone traveling using motels or friends and relatives to keep it cold while the car is off.
customer_reviews.author: Gourtrude

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to trips!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our long car trips and it works great! Because it takes a while to cool off, I recommend that you either plug it up overnight before you leave or put ice or a freezer pack in it to compensate until it has time to reach the appropriate cooling temp. We have not yet tried the heating function, but it is very easy to switch from cooling to heating. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: TKelly

customer_reviews.title: Have to get for road trips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler, make sure you buy the A/C adapter to plug into your hotel room when overnighting. Read the instructions and make sure you have the Blue arrow plugged in correctly. I freeze several small water bottles and use as coolant. Not rated 5 because the inside fan is about 3/4 up cooler, so be careful not to let water level get into fan. The cord is plenty long, but somewhat flimsy. I have a Jeep Grand Cherokee and plug into adapter by tailgate but cooler is between seats. Kooler only runs when car or AC is on.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: 50 days on the road and still working!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son when he decided to drive and camp across the country. It worked out so well for him and he could not have been happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No joke, the best cooler I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review on any item that I've ever purchased but I felt the need to do so with this one. I am an over the road trucker and I want to let others know that this is the best cooler you could ever get! I'm not joking. It keeps my items at 40 degrees or lower. I have not used that heat part of the cooler because I have no need for that. If you're looking for an item to keep your food cold on long trips you have got to give this one a try. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great travel cooler
customer_reviews.text: We just arrived home after a 3 1/2 month road trip. We needed to keep medications and food items refrigerated. This cooler fit between my wheelchair and my husband's driver's seat. It worked perfectly the entire trip (and got some rough handling on bumpy, curvy roads). Everything stayed cool and safe. We bought the Koolatron adaptor as well, which we recommend, because you can take it into a motel room & plug it in w/o worry about a room refrig.'s performance. Make sure the BLUE DOT LINES UP WITH ARROW if you use the cooling feature, or vice versa for heating. The swing handle was a great design feature too. We plan on using it for many future holidays!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all traveling needs. You’ll never have to buy any ice. It will even freeze your beverages if you don’t open the cooler at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses

customer_reviews.title: Had for 5 years now!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the longevity of this item--this cooler still works great after 5 years! Last one I had (different brand) died after 2 yrs. Cooler keeps items nice and cold when used in moderate temp. car.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: It does a fantastic job of keeping my food and drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: I am a truck driver and use this daily. It does a fantastic job of keeping my food and drinks cold. Sometimes my drinks are actually even bordering on trying to freeze. In my opinion Koolatron is one of the best brands out there. They are a bit pricey but Amazon saved me money compared to buying it at truck stop. Happy with purchase. This is a durable good product.
customer_reviews.author: KM Flesner

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite things!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband in Dec "08 intending to use it on our road trip honeymoon. We have gotten tons of use out of this. We use it for daytrips. We use it with the adapter to bring into hotel rooms with us. I love to bring some yogurt and small snacks and cream for coffee. It's not huge, but it's pretty roomy. We even use it during the holidays and for parties when there is not enough room for everything in our refrigerator. We have never used the heating part, so I can't attest to that. This unit is working for us today as well as the day we (I) bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler for long road trips!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I took this on vacation this past week. We were in the car for eight hours. Our food was cold and we had no issues. We were pleasantly surprised at putting room temperature drinks in it and they were cool two hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: A thin cooler/warming unit that can fit perfectly on the rear floor of my 4 door Hyundai Sonata and still have rear passenger leg room on each side of it. Functions as described. Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Madame D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cooler system broke down after just lightly using it a few times! Not very durable! UPDATE: After several times following up about the breakdown that happened after using it just under 5 times! They would not even be willing to handle the shopping which comes out to $60 to send to Canada to fix the darn thing! So disappointed and such a waste of money and horrible customer service. Never buy Koolateon again :(
customer_reviews.author: Payam L.

customer_reviews.title: It works much better than my old Coleman does
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months now and it works very well. It works much better than my old Coleman does. This cools down much quicker when plugged into the 120 V outlet in preparation for moving it to the car. My old Coleman takes a full day of being plugged into 120 V to be ready, this one takes about an hour to be fully cooled and ready to go. This, even though the instructions call for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Butt

customer_reviews.title: Best electric cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my 18 wheeler. So it's used continuously. It keeps thing cold. Sometimes it even will freeze a bottle of water in it. This is my second one. The first one lasted over two years of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Poor seal
customer_reviews.text: The top of this was too loose to be effective. If it had a seal of any sort it could have been great! Nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with longer trips in mind. Have used it three times now and have not had any issues! Also bought the cord they suggested, and it is working great. First time we had it in a hotel overnight, the box on the cord was really hot, but nothing seemed to be affected. Water and food were kept at a great temperature. Will update if any negatives are found. Oh, it really doesn't hold a lot while leaving the airflow unobstructed, but you can refill it daily.
customer_reviews.author: retired teacher

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool cooler!!!! I was on the road for a month and was able to keep all my food cold and would take it inside of places I was staying and plugged it in the the adapter that I had bought. I highly recommend this cooler. So much better than using ice and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: No More Ice Needed
customer_reviews.text: Great for travelling. No more looking for ice machines. It hold more without having to add ice. I have a larger one also. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I used this during the summer and it worked well enough. This cooler is higher priced than some, but doesn't seem better made than the nondescript models on store shelves. For example, the top lid swivels on two little plastic polyps that protrude from each side of the door. These LPPs fit into corresponding notches in the body of the cooler. One of the protruding appendages on my cooler is misshaped and fails to hold, so the door tends to lift off my cooler when opened. The cooler still cools, but the words "cheap piece of sh...plastic" flash across my cortex whenever this happens. Still, I guess it's good enough.
customer_reviews.author: zardac

customer_reviews.title: ... get near as cold as my other one very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one as my other one died this one does not get near as cold as my other one very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rat

customer_reviews.title: function and value good. Note that this takes 12 hours to cool ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time as advertised. Fit, function and value good. Note that this takes 12 hours to cool a room temperature item. So in a car, only put things in that are already cold....then it works well. When on the road we take it into the hotel with us and fill it with ice for the evening, dump it in the morning, plug in and works great. (you could plug it in all night in hotel as well)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert S. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: ... my freightliner for over a year now and fits great between the seats
customer_reviews.text: Been using this in my freightliner for over a year now and fits great between the seats. Keeps everything cold but can't leave it plugged in over night or my truck voltage gets too low and cuts power to everything so anything in my mini fridge goes bad after two days. Just remember to unplug over night.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Berens

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but died after extended use
customer_reviews.text: When we got this, it worked very well when traveling. Afterwards when we back, I set it up next to our bed For my wife to usefor her snacks & drinks(she is bedridden) where we ran it constantly. It needed defrosting from time to time, but otherwise ran flawlessly for about 8 months before the cooling element died. I am disappointed that it died, but also realize that it wasn't designed for constant use, so I don't have any real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: R. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buy
customer_reviews.text: It is good for travelers it fits well between the front and back seat of most cars. It works well if you want cold drinks or snacks this is our third one my husband delivers rv’s so it gets used on a regular bases
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Great product to travel with. Large interior space, stays cool and is quiet when running. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to travel with drinks, milk, fruits, veggies cheese etc. No more warm food on long trips. We can take it into hotels and plug it in there too, to save unpacking everything.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hedquist

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of these this one is what I needed and also a lot cheaper than in the truck stop
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: better then I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep a very expensive medication cold for a few days of a long trip. At the last minute I was nervous in case it didn't work, so I put the med into a special medicine carrier and food into the cooler. I shouldn't have worried. It was great and kept the food at a good temperature. It doesn't hold lots of stuff but for 2 people it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: grandma of 16

customer_reviews.title: Best invention since I don't know when!
customer_reviews.text: We travel alot from small trips to 2 week trips and bring this cooler with us everywhere. It works wonderfully and keeps everything cold very well. When we travel with bottles of water/soda bottles we put them in the cooler and they stay so cold, you would think they were kept in the refrigerator. We haven't used the heating part of the kooler, but are sure it will work just as well as the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Scc49969

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for about 3-4 days
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our trip across the country in March from Maryland to Washington State. It was perfect for about 3-4 days. Then it died and all our stuff was ruined. My wife had made Bullet Proof Coffee pucks, fat bombs and other little goodies to keep her blood sugar in check. It was a complete disaster. We were not staying at a hotel with a kitchen for a couple more days and that made things rough for her. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: works great! used it on a 12 hour long road trip for frozen homemade baby food. kept it frozen no problem. large space, fits plenty of things. light weight. slim fit so it fit behind the front seats no problem. quiet, cant even hear it when the radio is off. would recommend the adapter to plug into an outlet (comes separate) if you are going to stay over night anywhere like a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced electric cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good price on electric cooler large enough to hold drinks and some grocery items while traveling. Used once on 2 week trip. Works great for our needs. Kept drinks cold for several hours in a hot car. Highly recommend the power adapter to use in hotel room at night to keep it cold.
customer_reviews.author: Rulouie2

customer_reviews.title: Good for a road trip.
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for about two weeks now, so far it is working good but don’t expect to have the drinks iced cold it is more of keeping them just cold enough to drink. The other issue is that is does not have a ligth to know that is on. It is real quiet and seems good for a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: rey1992

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: On the advice of a friend, we purchased this cooler for a long car trip. After reading the reviews, I made certain that I pre-chilled the cooler for 24 hours as well as the food. After 13 hours in the car (plugged in, of course), the food was still cold even though we opened the cooler a number of times and stopped occasionally. My one complaint is the need to purchase the AC adapter separately since the cooler works best if chilled prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Happy as I can be
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with my purchase. My Koolatron kept drinks and snacks very cold with no problem. As other reviewers have already noted you need to power up the unit roughly 12 hours prior to loading it with items you want to keep it cold. This unit is not a refrigerator so if you pack it with items not chilled already in refrigerator then it will be a long time before things get cold. Whether my unit will be reliable long term I cannot say but on my recent use I have used it four days straight without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kim

customer_reviews.title: The food did stay cool, no complaints about that
customer_reviews.text: Fridge very small for the prize, you can hardly fit anything in it Other than that it is ok. Do not let it run over night when it is attached to your car. My car died. That is why I give four stars and because it is very small. The food did stay cool, no complaints about that.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift and when he opened the present he was excited to have it. It's his second one. He uses it in his semi and he just loves it. It holds everything he needs. The inside is very roomy and it keeps everything thing cold. The first one he had was stolen. He had that one for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis  D Venable

customer_reviews.title: mine worked for 10 years!
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted 10 years, we think a power surge killed it while plugged in - buying another one today - it's not big or super cold as mentioned but works good with cold items - we use for weekend road trips. this one is pretty well built - good strong handle and fits behind the passenger seat easily.....
customer_reviews.author: Design/Builder

customer_reviews.title: Used it on the hotel room and it worked better than the mini-frig in the hotel room
customer_reviews.text: Use mine for two weekend excursion and very please with the performance. Plugged it in using the multi-purpose adapter the night before loading the unit with drinks and food. Plugged it in the DC outlet in the car and the Koolatron worked perfectly. Used it on the hotel room and it worked better than the mini-frig in the hotel room. Why the 110AC to 12volt DC adapter is optional doesn't make good sense.
customer_reviews.author: RWT

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to keep breastmilk from getting hot on long road trips, and it works like a charm. I did purchase it with an electric outlet connector so we could keep it running at the hotel as well. It fits perfect under the child seat behind the driver's seat in a VW Passat, and it is not so loud that it keeps anyone up during the night when it is running. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cooling
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and he loves it. Food and drinks stay icy cold. He hasn't used the heating part but does appreciate the cooling
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Stadtlander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is both compact and efficient. On a recent three week trip, it performed flawlessly. It kept medications, drinks, snacks and Ice packs really cold. Upon reaching our destinations we could take the ice packs into the Hotel/Motel and freeze them in short order. We mounted the Kooler in the space behind the driver's seat in our 2011 Ford Escape where it could plug into the center console. There is plenty of cord length to have reached into the dashboard receptical if it was necessary. We look forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this May 14,2020 and completely stopped working July 25th.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great travel fridge
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in our 4 hour trip. We were very impressed by how cold our drinks were.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Petit

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket at the present time, time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: It's just me and I can't afford a 12V compressor fridge. Serves me well so far. Size is perfect for my minivan.
customer_reviews.author: keltyfan

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in years!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It fits behind the front seat on the floor, in easy reach of the front seat passenger. Keeps all my food very cold when on the road. I don't unplug it unless I'm not running my car/truck for many hours. Brought it into the motel/house overnight to plug in. Even when not running it keeps my food cold for several hours. I did plug it in to get cold before loading--took only 1 1/2 hrs to get cold. The handle is recessed so it's easy to remove if the front seat is back against the cooler.Love not having to deal with melting ice!
customer_reviews.author: Barb K

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: My husband is OTR driver. This freezes up constantly and the fan makes a rattling noise. Not happy with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bolick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We've used it twice and it works just as described. It cooled about 42 degrees below ambient. We bought the adapter and plugged it in when the ambient temp was 76 degrees. It cooled down to 33 degrees inside the cooler. Same when we had it outside. 82 degrees ambient and 40 inside. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Shively

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described!
customer_reviews.text: We got this specifically because we were traveling from California to Canada and would be gone for 3 weeks. I cook for my dog so I had to have something to keep her food fresh once I opened a home canned jar or frozen meat product for her. It worked very well just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: The Koolatron works very well. It cools drinks as expected and works quietly. My only complaint, thus far, is that I wish the product had an on/off switch. As it stands, it's either plugged in and working...or not. In order to change from cooling to heating, the plug must be reversed. Its a bit inconvenient to have to reach to the back seat to unplug it or change it from cool to heat or vice versa. A relatively simple addition of a switch would make the product nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: We loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. We bought one last summer for a cross country trip. We kept drinks, fruit, veggies, yogurt, etc. Everything stayed cold. No stopping to find ice. No water slop in the bottom. We just bought 3 more to give to our kids' families. We did paint the hot/cold arrow with silver nail polish as it is hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: GgG

customer_reviews.title: Can keep food cool or warm.
customer_reviews.text: If left on with designated power plug in, car will be dead next morning. Bring indoors with adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! I am a truck driver and this thing is amazing!! I only wish it was bigger. I can only get about 5 lunchables in here so it's not to big. But it freezes my water to where the edges inside the bottle are frozen. Will buy another if I find a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Lzzy Hale Freak

customer_reviews.title: Great product just follow directions on which way you plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product just follow directions on which way you plug it in. Can be a cooler or a warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Denis McSweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not great for my road trip
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get very cold, and didn't stay cold. Not great for my road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: ... Koolatron P-20 about six months ago and are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Koolatron P-20 about six months ago and are very pleased with it. The size is perfect for our vehicle and the adapter makes using the Koolatron in the garage 24-7 a nice convenience. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.......
customer_reviews.text: The compact size of this unit is perfect to fit behind the front seats in our sedan, and yet will fit a couple of dozen soda cans or whatever. When it arrived, I plugged it in and within three hours was plenty cold to fill with pre-cooled items and hit the road. An additional bonus: it is made in CANADA. Maybe it will last until the Kung Pao Chicken gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one and we love it. We travel a lot! this thing sometimes runs for two or three weeks at a time and it lasts. Yes it doesn't keep things ice cold, but for perishables it is a must. Don't pack it too full and put cold items in to it and you will be fine. Make sure You don't cover up the ac adapter. Our fault, a shirt fell off the rack on to the optional wall adapter and over heated the product. It was 8 years old and must have had 8,000 hours on it. It owed us nothing Our new one is working just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Travellin Gretz

customer_reviews.title: Kooltron P-20 Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good Cooler, but doesn't cool as well as the bigger units. Use a battery saver if you use this with the vehicle off or you'll end up with a dead battery
customer_reviews.author: Oddball

customer_reviews.title: Test run
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in good time. Planning 3000 mi. trip. Will be put to the test. Have used it as recommended in instructions and worked fine. Fan very quiet, nice fit behind seat, filled with 24 cans of pop that had been refriged and they stayed cold after 2hr. drive, and still cold in morning after sitting overnight with power off. I give this cooler a A+ on function, have not tried the heat mode yet, maybe next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Grandparents

customer_reviews.title: Great for long trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who was retiring and traveling the US. Just got an email from them and they have traveled from the west coast to the east coast and couldn't be happier with their gift. They said it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Koolatron P20 12V Compact Electric Cooler and Warmer (18 Quarts/17 Liters) 23 Cans Capacity - Portable, Iceless Thermoelectric Cooling, Removable Shelf, Gray
feature_bullets: Slim, compact design is ideal for minivans, SUVs, or small cars. Material : Plastic, hard-sided. Folding handle.
State of the art thermoelectric cooling system. Cools to approiximately 40F degree /22C degree below outside temperature. Heats to approximately135 degree F/57 degree C inside.

Uses 12 Volts power to cool or warm drinks and food. Material : Plastic, hard-sided. Folding handle. Can also plug the P20 Compact Cooler into any standard outlet in your home, cottage or hotel with Koolatron AC Adapter-sold separately from any 110/120 volt AC wall outet.

Quiet motor and fan circulate air for even cooling/heating. Heats to approximately135 degree F/57 degree C inside.High performance with low power draw.Cools to approiximately 40F degree /22C degree below outside temperature.

Can also plug the P20 Compact Cooler into any standard outlet in your home, cottage or hotel with Koolatron AC Adapter-sold separately from any 110/120 volt AC wall outet.High performance with low power draw.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars704 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
